program.name: openjade
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=common" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=common" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-osf*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev4" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev4" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-hpux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -march=1.1" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -march=1.1" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v7" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v7" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CXX="${CXX:-g++}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" PERL=${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl --enable-http \ --disable-mif --enable-static -enable-shared \ --enable-spincludedir=${SB_VAR_OPENSP_INC} \ --enable-splibdir=${SB_VAR_OPENSP_LIB} --datadir="${_datadir}" \ --enable-default-catalog=${SB_VAR_XMLCATALOG}/catalog.sgml \ --enable-default-search-path=${SB_VAR_XMLCATALOG} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

item.para: Update path to SGML catalog file
